price: (Tetapi mereka tidak mau makan), karena itu Ibrāhīm merasa takut terhadap mereka.  Mereka berkata, "Janganlah kamu takut," dan mereka memberi kabar gembira kepadanya dengan (kelahiran) seorang anak yang alim (Isḥāq).
arabic: فَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِيفَةٗۖ قَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-awjasa min'hum khīfatan qālū lā takhaf wabasharūhu bighulāmin ʿalīmin
translations: and they gave him glad tidings
